name: Scorched (Koggle)
description:
This is my first time working on a 'full' game.

This is still a very, very early version but I wanted to put something out there.

The few sounds that I did NOT can be found in the following links.

Various sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Snow Footsteps:

1.  https://freesound.org/s/114389/  

2. https://freesound.org/s/421022/

Background Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
